title.rendered: STEDI FORD RANGER PX2/PX3 & EVEREST TECH PACK LOWER GRILLE LED LIGHT BAR KIT

content.rendered:
What is included in each kit:

  • PX2 / PX3 / Everest – No tech pack or tech pack located on drivers side
    • 1x set Ford Ranger/Everest lower grille mounting bracket
    • 2x stainless steel bolts
    • 2x flat stainless steel washers
    • 2x Nylock nut
    • 1x ST3K 21.5″ LED light bar
    • Ford Ranger piggy back adaptor
  • PX3 / Everest – Tech pack located in centre of grille
    • 2x set Ford Ranger/Everest lower grille mounting bracket
    • 4x stainless steel bolts
    • 4x flat stainless steel washers
    • 4x Nylock nut
    • 2x ST3K 11.5″ LED light bars
    • 1x Smart harness – dual connector
    • 1x Ford Ranger piggy back adaptor

Please note, light bars, piggy back adaptors & smart harnesses can also be bought individually – check out our range of Stedi products HERE!

If you wish to purchase only the mounting kit, without any extras (e.g. light bars, smart harness & piggy back adaptors) – CLICK HERE!

ENGINEERED TO SUIT RANGER | EVEREST

Specifically designed to fit Ford Ranger MK2 (PX2) & Everest 2015 to current all sub-models including XL, XLS, XLT, Wildtrak & FX4 | Trend, Ambiente & Titanium. Perfectly fits the STEDI ST3K 21.5″ Light Bar in the lower grille opening. This is the graceful & robust lower grill mount you’ve been waiting for.

AFTERMARKET YET COHESIVE

The Everest & Ranger is one of few utes on the market that has an attractive front-end right out of the box. Every detail of the lower grill mount has been carefully considered to ensure that depth & height remains cohesive with the overall front-end design. The end result is a perfectly located light bar that strikes the ideal balance between aftermarket & original equipment vibe.

INTELLIGENT DESIGN BOLTS

We’ve spent the time designing and testing to ensure that the installation is fast & reliable. No drilling, no cutting, and no compromises. Manufactured from 3mm thick powder coated stainless steel and folded in all the right places to ensure a vibration-free install.

DETAILS

Designed to fit Ford Ranger MK2 (PX2) & Everest 2015 to 2018 (UA Chassis) all sub-models including XL, XLS, XLT, Wildtrak & FX4 | Trend, Ambient, Titanium. Will also fit Ford Ranger Raptor and newer PX3 Ranger without a radar box in the lower grille.

Ranger Raptor and PX3 (XLS only) require two holes to be drilled in the lower steel support as the pre-existing mounting holes are absent. 

Manufactured with 3mm Stainless Steel with satin powder coat, and designed to be fastened to pre-existing holes which are already present on the inner steel support. This is a completely non-intrusive install meaning that no new holes need to be made, nor do sections of the front bumper need any cutting or modifying.

The end result is a very robust, stealth installation.

The design is optimized to suit our STEDI ST3K-21.5″  LED Light Bar.

  • Black Powder Coated Finish
  • 3 Series Stainless Steel
  • Designed to minimize disruption of air-flow
  • No need to remove the front bumper
  • Bolts to pre-existing holes
  • No drilling required, bolt and nut kit included (Excluding PXIII and Everest with Tech-Pack in centre)

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI FORD RANGER PX3 & EVEREST TECH PACK LOWER GRILLE LED LIGHT BAR KIT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
